and we got to travel in it .
output.sentences: A brave American soul dreamed of a real hot hair balloon ride.
The air was full of excitement tonight, with the expectation of rising through sky.
She longed for travel her entire life.
The view was magnificent, living up to her expectations.
Time seemed to stop and she stared up basking in the feel of the sun on her skin and her eyes taken in the familiar white stars.
